articles.title: Tottenham: Harry Kane slammed by Gabby Agbonlahor for Masters trip before Brighton defeat - Daily Mail
articles.description: Harry Kane's decision to fly to Augusta for the Masters last weekend must be questioned after his sluggish performance in Tottenham's 1-0 defeat at home to Brighton, says Gabby Agbonlahor.
